General.Name: Shanghai Jielong Industry Group Corp Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Eliansy Industry Group Corporation Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in packaging printing business in China and internationally. The company provides packaging and printing services for food, beverage, books, electrical appliances, medicine, fast-moving consumer goods and other industries. It is also involved in the rental of commercial properties; and provision of business services. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Jielong Industry Group Corporation Limited. Shanghai Eliansy Industry Group Corporation Limited is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
